
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/19022253" title="发布于 2025-08-04 21:34">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一款免费、简单、高效的在线数据库设计工具</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在当今数据驱动的时代，数据库设计已成为开发者和数据分析师必备的一项核心技能。今天大姚给大家分享一款免费、简单、高效的在线数据库设计工具：dbdiagram。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>工具介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>dbdiagram 是一款免费、简单、高效的在线图形化数据库设计工具，专为开发者和数据分析师设计。它可以通过输入 <span>DSL（领域特定语言）代码来快速绘制数据库 ER 图。支持 MySQL、<span>PostgreSQL、SQL Server 等多种数据库，支持 SQL 导入与导出（导出为 PDF/PNG/SVG）。</span></span></span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>工具特点</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>支持从 SQL 转储文件快速生成图表。</span></li>
<li><span>支持一键将你的图表分享给同事和客户。</span></li>
<li><span>支持直接生成创建数据库表的 SQL 语句。</span></li>
<li><span>支持输入 DSL 代码来绘制数据库图表（ERDs）。</span></li>
<li><span>支持 MySQL、PostgreSQL、SQL Server 等多种数据库。</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在线使用</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>在线文档：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://dbdiagram.io/home" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://dbdiagram.io/home</span></a></span></li>
<li>在线使用地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://dbdiagram.io/d" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://dbdiagram.io/d</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span data-cacheurl="" data-remoteid="" data-lazy-bgimg="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31bnjJicJN3M04iasyc0Pg51F35htDYickEYfeFJoWAUd6MIQJtpGV9nyTUJEFQ1pic1Le5zGZE3XW9Kf/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg" data-src="https://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_svg/9M0PhLTmTIfzNFlBn3E31bnjJicJN3M04iasyc0Pg51F35htDYickEYfeFJoWAUd6MIQJtpGV9nyTUJEFQ1pic1Le5zGZE3XW9Kf/640?wx_fmt=svg&amp;from=appmsg&amp;randomid=zb5dntsr" data-fail="0"><code><span>Table follows {<br><span>&nbsp; following_user_id&nbsp;integer<br><span>&nbsp; followed_user_id&nbsp;integer<br><span>&nbsp; created_at timestamp<br><span>}<br><br><span>Table users {<br><span>&nbsp; id&nbsp;integer<span>&nbsp;[primary key]<br><span>&nbsp; username varchar<br><span>&nbsp; role varchar<br><span>&nbsp; created_at timestamp<br><span>}<br><br><span>Table posts {<br><span>&nbsp; id&nbsp;integer<span>&nbsp;[primary key]<br><span>&nbsp; title varchar<br><span>&nbsp; body text [note:&nbsp;'Content of the post'<span>]<br><span>&nbsp; user_id&nbsp;integer<span>&nbsp;[not null]<br><span>&nbsp; status varchar<br><span>&nbsp; created_at timestamp<br><span>}<br><br><span>Ref user_posts: posts.user_id &gt; users.id // many-to-one<br><br><span>Ref: users.id &lt; follows.following_user_id<br><br><span>Ref: users.id &lt; follows.followed_user_id<br></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></code></span></pre>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250804213238639-1325395812.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250804213242998-1274287741.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250804213248740-644272869.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202508/1336199-20250804213254117-1942082199.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多数据库设计工具</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>该款实用工具已收录至 Awesome Tools，程序员常用高效实用工具、软件资源精选，办公效率提升利器。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li>Gitee：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/Awesome-Tools" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/Awesome-Tools</span></a></span></li>
<li><span>GitHub：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/Awesome-Tools" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/Awesome-Tools</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
